statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, price, payment_method FROM sales_data WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price, MIN(price) AS lowest_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, price, payment_method FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_payments;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_method FROM qr_code_payments WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM qr_code_payments WHERE payment_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold < 10;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_payments WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold < 10 ORDER BY sale_id DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_method FROM qr_code_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY sale_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_payments JOIN sales_data ON qr_code_payments.transaction_id = sales_data.payment_id WHERE qr_code_payments.payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY sales_data.quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000;
SELECT ProductID, SaleAmount FROM SalesData WHERE PaymentMethod = 'Credit Card';
SELECT PaymentID, PaymentAmount, PaymentDate FROM QRCodePayments WHERE PaymentAmount < 50;
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleAmount DESC;
SELECT PaymentMethod, TotalPayments FROM PopularPaymentMethods WHERE TotalPayments > 100;
SELECT SaleID, ProductID, SaleAmount, PaymentMethod FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000 ORDER BY SaleAmount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE PaymentMethod IN ('Credit Card', 'PayPal') ORDER BY SaleAmount ASC, SaleID DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT PaymentID, PaymentAmount, PaymentDate FROM QRCodePayments WHERE PaymentAmount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY PaymentDate ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT PaymentMethod, TotalPayments FROM PopularPaymentMethods WHERE TotalPayments >= 1000 ORDER BY LastUpdatedDate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ProductID) AS UniqueProducts, AVG(SaleAmount) AS AvgSaleAmount FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, sale_date FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, qr_code_id, amount FROM qr_code_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT method_name, description FROM payment_methods ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM sales_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT payment_method, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY payment_method;
SELECT * FROM qr_code_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, payment_methods.method_name FROM customers JOIN payment_methods ON customers.id = payment_methods.id;
